extends java.lang.Object

    Raúl Reguillo Carmona

      • getResourcesInLevel

        public static java.util.ArrayList<com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.RDFNode> getResourcesInLevel(java.lang.String endpoint,
                                                                         java.lang.String uri,
                                                                         int depth)
        search for triples with format: uri ?p ?o in the 0 level. After that, it searchs all the relationships throughout levels with n limit.
        Parameters:
        endpoint -
        uri -
        depth -
        Returns:
        ArrayList with the recursive search in depth = n (0..n)
